document_data.name: Taerlene
document_data.mainbody: '''Taerlene''' was a hairdresser working at the [[Dragonriders Club]] in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Mrarie usually did the hair of [[mask dancer]]s at the Dragonriders Club, including [[Amarune Whitewave]]. She worked until at least the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
document_data.Relationships: One fellow hair stylist at the club was [[Mrarie]].
